la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshig kyal ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis tshig kyal ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang chags
sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ chags sems spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod
cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang
gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/
log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/ tshul khrims des nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi chos gang la yang chags par myi 'gyur na/ gzhan man chad lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa skyes te/ de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ gshe ba 'am/ 'khyal ba 'am/ gcad pa

pa 'am/ gtub pa 'am/ brdeg pa myed do snyam pas de la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du gal te sems can thams cad drung du lhags nas spyo ste/ bkyal tam/

rdo dbyug gis brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab ste bcad gtubs kyang de la 'di snyam ste/ kye ma chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di la chos gang la yang spyo ba 'am/ bkyal pa 'am/ bcad

pa 'am/ gtub pa 'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ bcing pa myed do snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus skyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya 'am/
'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong

ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag du song ste/ sems can rnams la chos ston cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab
tu 'god do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la rab tu 'god do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /lan cig

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

la rab tu 'god do/ /de yang ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu bkod de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/ byang chub sems dpa'i
ting nge 'dzin kyang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas shing / rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs

dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo / /brgyad gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /

nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched

la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha'

yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye

mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar

bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs

te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo / /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chun sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dod

pas dben pa sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang /

rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran
pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs
shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas
so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so

zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la

nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de
dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo / /de rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de

dag rnam par phye zhing seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de gang zhe na/
rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las
langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs
nas nam mkha' mtha' las skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rnam shes

mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /
'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms
par 'jug go/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa
las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ste/ de seng ge rnam par bsgyings

pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rnam par smyin par byas nas/ thod rgal kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thod rgal de gang zhe na/ rab 'byor
'di la de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can
bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/
bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs
nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms

par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
gnas so/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs
nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/
bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las
langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs
nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
'jug go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/
chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms
par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam
par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /
mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug go/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ mnyam
par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las
langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas
skye mched las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha'
mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan
bzhi pa las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs
nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ mnyam
par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su

byed do/ /de thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga bcu gnyis so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/ tshe dang ldan rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang thabs mkhas pa de
lta bu dang ldan pa de/ yun ring po ji srid gcig nas yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po/ de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang thabs mkhas pa de lta
bu dang ldan pa des/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
des ni sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsnyen bkur bar rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des/
dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bskrun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
mkhas pa dang ldan pa des/ yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de
lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gling bzhir/ las

byed cing gling bzhi'i rjes su 'gro'o/ /gling bzhi'i rjes su 'brang ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lngar las byed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rjes su 'gro'o/ /

pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rjes su 'brang ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob bo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying myi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bral na/ rin po che sna bdun gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i mying
myi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying myi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim thab
myed pa'i bud myed rnams ni/ 'phyon ma pa rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ bdud dam
bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim thab dpa' bos shin tu bsrungs pa'i bud myed shin tu phun sum tshogs pa'i khyim na 'dug pa ni/

'phyon ma pa rnams kyis myi tshugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis myi tshugs pa yin

no/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yul du 'gro ba'i skyes bu go cha tshang bar gyon pa mtshon cha thams cad thogs pa ni g.yul ngor 'dug pa'i tshe/ rgyal po zla ba 'am/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra rnams kyis thub par dka'o/ /

rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nam/ byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa rnams kyis

kyang thub par dka'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la khams kyi rgyal po yod pa rnams ni nang nub nang nub cing rim gror bya ba'i don du drung du 'ong ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu

phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu klung gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ni chu klung

chen po gang ga gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /de dag chu klung gang ga dang 'grogs shing rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin
na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas pa ni dgos pa thams cad byed do/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yang de bzhin du blta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni lag pa g.yon pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu klung phra mo rnams kyi chu dang chu klung chen po rnams kyi chu gang ji snyed

cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rgya mtsho chen por phyin pa 'di lta ste/ lan tsa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
yongs su zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du phyin pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur

ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du ni/ 'khor lo rin po che 'gro zhing 'dug ste/ gang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zas kyi don du 'dug par gyur pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i

dpung gi tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par byed cing 'khor lo rin po che de dag gnas nas g.yo ba myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bkri ba
yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong zhing / der gnas so/ /der gnas par gyur nas kyang gnas de las myi 'da'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i

rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che de dang / blon po rin po che de dang / khyim bdag rin po che de dang / bud myed rin po che de dang / nor bu rin po che de dang / glang po rin po che de dang / rta rin po che de dag ni dpung

gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi mdun du 'gro ste/ mdun du song nas kyang rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo

snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi

bzhin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin te/ ci 'ang nus pa myed pa ngo bo nyid kyis
stong zhing gsol te/ smyig rgyu lta bu'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags
na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/

'di snyam du kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa ste/ de dag ni thabs mkhas pas/ 'khor ba nas yongs su gdon par myi nus kyis/ ma la bdag gis sems can de dag gi don du sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o snyam nas/ de sems can de dag gi don du phyi nang gi dngos po rnams yongs su gtong ste/ de yongs su gtong

ba'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ bdag gis gang yang yongs su gtang ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po 'di dag ni bdag nyid 'jig pa'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du tshul khrims ngan pa'i skabs myi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de ni 'di ltar de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la srog gcod pa byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas
log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun gyi tshig smra ba dang / phra ma can du 'gyur ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa can du 'gyur ba dang / chags sems can du 'gyur ba dang / gnod

sems su byed pa dang / log par lta ba can du 'gyur ba dang / yul la smon pa dang / lhar smon pa dang / tshangs par smon pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar smon pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar smon pa 'di ni bdag la tshul dang

myi 'dra'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu tshig rtsub pa dang /
brlang bas rtag tu spyos shing / brgyad kyang 'khrug pa'i sems myi skyed/ rdo dbyug dang / bong ba dang / mtshon gyis btab cing bsnun pa dang / lus kyi yan lag gshags sam/ yan lag dang nying lag bcad

kyang zhe sdang gi sems myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni sgra thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rab tu rtog go/ /gzugs thams cad dbu ba lta bur yongs su rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ le lo'i sems
myi skyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ mtho ris su skye ba'ang le lo can gyis rnyed par dka' na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyis/

de bas na bdag gis nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /rtag tu brtson pa myi 'dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ rab
'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du sems myi 'khrugs pa yin te/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan du skye ba 'ang sems 'khrugs pas rnyed par dka' na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos
kyis/ de bas na bdag gis nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdag gis sems ma 'khrugs par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su
rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang shes rab dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma
zhugs par rnam pa gzhan gyis sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar myi nus kyis/ de bas na bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
gal te pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la tha dad pa ma mchis na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rab ces bgyi/ gtso 'o zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/
dam pa zhes bgyi/ phul zhes bgyi/ gya nom pa zhes bgyi/ bla na myed pa zhes bgyi/ gong na myed pa zhes bgyi/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ni/ rnam pa tha dad pa gang yang myed de/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa myed na ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i

mying 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lus rnam pa tha dad pa rnams ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du phyin na/ kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la brten na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du phyin na 'di lta ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog gcig par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'i khyad par gang yang myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed pas/ de'i phyir khyad par myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos gang la yang khyad par ma mchis la bye brag ma mchis na/ rjes su thob par
'gyur ba ni gang zhig mchis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po de dag gi rab ces bgyi/ gtso bo zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/ dam pa zhes bgyi/ phul zhes bgyi/

gya nom pa zhes bgyi/ bla na myed pa zhes bgyi/ gong na myed pa zhes bgyi/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /

de de bzhin te/ don rjes su thob par bya ba la/ chos gang yang bye brag dang khyad par myed de/ 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang brdar bya na/ sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su gdon pa'i don du

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yang yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /sems can de dag la yang skye ba myed do/ /'chi ba myed do/ /'pho ba myed do/ /sems can myed pas/ chos thams cad myed

par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi rab ces bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/

gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ gong na myed pa zhes bya/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi bud myed gang ji snyed pa

de dag gi nang na bud myed rin po che ni rab ces bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ gong na myed pa zhes bya/ mnyam pa myed pa

zhes bya/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab ces bgyi ba dang / gtso bo zhes bgyi ba dang / mchog ces bgyi ba dang / dam pa

zhes bgyi ba dang / phul zhes bgyi ba dang / gya nom pa zhes bgyi ba dang / bla na myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / gong na myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes
bgyi ba de ci las dgongs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung zhing myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ gtong ba mchis sam/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ gtong ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad yongs
su bzung ba myed pa dang / gtang ba myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad myi 'dzin myi gtong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba yongs su myi

'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yongs

su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgra yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dri yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ni ro yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni reg yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyi rnam par

shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin

myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab

'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i

'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce'i

'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chu'i khams

yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mye'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlung gi khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma

rig pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mying dang gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni reg pa yongs su myi

'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sred pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

len pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

ni rga shi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin

myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi

gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su myi

'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa

stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi

dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin

myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dbang po

lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stobs lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs myed pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying rje chen

po yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i

'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang byang chub yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na
tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs
su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji
ltar na lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma
btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sgra yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na reg yongs su
ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lus
kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba
lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung
ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/

ji ltar na chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mye'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i

khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed yongs su ma

bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/

ji ltar na reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sred pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na len pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba

lags/ ji ltar na srid pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na skye ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rga shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar

na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung

ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs

su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba

lags/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su

ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/

ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dbang po lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba
lags/ ji ltar na stobs lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/
ji ltar na tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su

ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
pa myed pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar
na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang

ba lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad

yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na

phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lam
gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs

yid la myi byed pas/ gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ 'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma
btang ba yin no/ /'du byed yid la myi byed pas/ 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig yid

la myi byed pas/ myig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rna ba yid la myi byed pas/ rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sna yid la myi byed pas/ sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lce yid la
myi byed pas/ lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lus yid la myi byed pas/ lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid yid la myi byed pas/ yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /

gzugs yid la myi byed pas/ gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sgra yid la myi byed pas/ sgra yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dri yid la myi byed pas/ dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /

ro yid la myi byed pas/ ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /reg yid la myi byed pas/ reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chos yid la myi byed pas/ chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig gi rnam

par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin
no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung
ma btang ba yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ yid

kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed
pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid
la myi byed pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid kyi
'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las

byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sna'i

'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/
lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /
sa'i khams yid la myi byed pas/ sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chu'i khams yid la myi byed pas/ chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mye'i khams yid la
myi byed pas/ mye'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rlung gi khams yid la myi byed pas/ rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams yid la myi byed pas/
nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la myi byed pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /ma rig pa yid la myi byed
pas/ ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'du byed yid la myi byed pas/ 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ rnam par shes pa
yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mying dang gzugs yid la myi byed pas/ mying dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /skye mched drug yid la myi byed pas/ skye mched drug yongs
su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sred pa yid la
myi byed pas/ sred pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /len pa yid la myi byed pas/ len pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /srid pa yid la myi byed pas/ srid pa yongs su ma
bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /skye ba yid la myi byed pas/ skye ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rga shi yid la mi byed pas/ rga shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed
pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba

yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang

ba yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa

nyid yid la myi byed pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma

bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ dor ba

myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la myi byed

pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myi dmyigs

pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba

yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la myi byed pas/

yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dbang po lnga yid la myi byed pas/
dbang po rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /stobs lnga yid la myi byed pas/ stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la myi byed pas/ byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la myi byed pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /bsam gtan bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin
no/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la myi byed pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la

myi byed pas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yid la myi byed pas/
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yid la myi byed pas/ mngon par shes pa
rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la myi byed pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la myi byed
pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yid la myi byed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang
ba yin no/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs

su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /snying rje chen po yid la myi byed pas/ snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yid la myi byed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la myi byed pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi

byed pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi byed pas/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid

yid la myi byed pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rang byang chub yid la myi byed pas/ rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la myi byed pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rab 'byor de ltar na/
gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam
par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /
lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sgra yongs su ma

bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig gi

rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su

ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang

ba yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lus kyi

'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rna ba'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma

bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sa'i khams yongs su ma
bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mye'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /nam mkha'i

khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /

rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mying dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /tshor ba

yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sred pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /len pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /srid pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /skye ba yongs su ma bzung

ma btang ba yin no/ /rga shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung

ma btang ba yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'dus

byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed

pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid

yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su

ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung

ma btang ba yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dbang po lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /stobs lnga yongs

su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma

bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /

rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma bzung ba btang ba yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi

yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /byams pa chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /dgra bcom pa
nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// //shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs yid la myi bgyi/ tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ 'du shes yid la myi bgyi/
'du byed yid la myi bgyi/ rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi/ myig yid la myi bgyi/ rna ba yid la myi bgyi/ sna yid la myi bgyi/ lce yid la myi bgyi/ lus yid la myi bgyi/ yid yid la myi bgyi/ gzugs

yid la myi bgyi/ sgra yid la myi bgyi/ dri yid la myi bgyi/ ro yid la myi bgyi/ reg yid la myi bgyi/ chos yid la myi bgyi/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi
bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la

myi bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi/

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ sa'i khams yid la myi bgyi/ chu'i khams yid la
myi bgyi/ mye'i khams yid la myi bgyi/ rlung gi khams yid la myi bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams yid la myi bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la myi bgyi/ ma rig pa yid la myi bgyi/ 'du byed yid la myi bgyi/
rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi/ mying dang gzugs yid la myi bgyi/ skye mched drug yid la myi bgyi/ reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ sred pa yid la myi bgyi/ len pa yid la myi bgyi/

srid pa yid la myi bgyi/ skye ba yid la myi bgyi/ rga shi yid la myi bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi

bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid

yid la myi bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid

la myi bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ rang

bzhin stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi

bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ dbang po lnga yid la myi bgyi/ stobs lnga yid la myi bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la myi bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yid la myi bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ bsam gtan bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ tshad myed pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la myi bgyi/ mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la myi bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yid la myi bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams yid la myi bgyi/ ting
nge 'dzin rnams yid la myi bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la myi bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la myi bgyi/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la myi

bgyi/ byams pa chen po yid la myi bgyi/ snying rje chen po yid la myi bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yid la myi bgyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la myi bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi bgyi/ phyir

myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ rang byang chub yid la myi bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la myi bgyi na/ 'o na
bcom ldan 'das gzugs yid la ma bgyis/ tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ 'du shes yid la ma bgyis/ 'du byed yid la ma bgyis/ rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ myig yid la ma bgyis/ rna ba yid la ma
bgyis/ sna yid la ma bgyis/ lce yid la ma bgyis/ lus yid la ma bgyis/ yid yid la ma bgyis/ gzugs yid la ma bgyis/ sgra yid la ma bgyis/ dri yid la ma bgyis/ ro yid la ma bgyis/
reg yid la ma bgyis/ chos yid la ma bgyis/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yid
la ma bgyis/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ sna'i 'dus te

reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
yid la ma bgyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ sa'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ chu'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ mye'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ rlung gi khams
yid la ma bgyis/ nam mkha'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ ma rig pa yid la ma bgyis/ 'du byed yid la ma bgyis/ rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ mying
dang gzugs yid la ma bgyis/ skye mched drug yid la ma bgyis/ reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ sred pa yid la ma bgyis/ len pa yid la ma bgyis/ srid pa yid la ma bgyis/ skye

ba yid la ma bgyis/ rga shi yid la ma bgyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/

phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid

la ma bgyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ dbang po lnga yid la ma bgyis/ stobs lnga yid la ma bgyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la ma bgyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la ma
bgyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ bsam gtan bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ tshad myed pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ rnam
par thar pa brgyad yid la ma bgyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la ma bgyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yid la ma
bgyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yid la ma bgyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la ma bgyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma bgyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la ma bgyis/ myi 'jigs pa

bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ byams pa chen po yid la ma bgyis/ snying rje chen po yid la ma bgyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yid la ma bgyis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid
la ma bgyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis/ dgra bcom pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rang byang chub yid la ma bgyis/ lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la ma bgyis pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel na yang /
ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su ma rdzogs na yang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam gzugs yid la myi byed/ tshor ba yid la myi byed/ 'du shes yid la myi byed/ 'du byed yid la myi byed/ rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ myig yid la myi byed/ rna ba yid
la myi byed/ sna yid la myi byed/ lce yid la myi byed/ lus yid la myi byed/ yid yid la myi byed/ gzugs yid la myi byed/ sgra yid la myi byed/ dri yid la myi byed/ ro yid la myi byed/ reg yid la

myi byed/ chos yid la myi byed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ lus kyi rnam

par shes pa yid la myi byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ lce'i 'dus

te reg pa yid la myi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i

tshor ba yid la myi byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ sa'i khams yid la myi byed/ chu'i khams yid la myi byed/ mye'i khams yid la myi byed/ rlung gi khams yid la myi byed/ nam mkha'i khams yid la myi byed/
